pathways.name: Peacekeeper
pathways.description: Keeper of the Peace: Peacekeeper Armor Set, Peacekeeper 1 Handed Axe, Weak Sharpshooter Crossbow and bolts, 15 tier 1 UV flares, 10 Blue Glowsticks, 2 Clean Bandages, 6 Tiers of Crafting PeaceKeeper Reinforcements Recipes

pathways.name: Veteran
pathways.description: The Veteran: Starts out with a Tier 1 Military Armor Set, a Pistol, 48 rounds of ammo, 1 Handed Club, Renegade 2 Handed Axe, 5 tier 1 Molotovs, 2 Basic Bandages

pathways.name: Road Warrior
pathways.description: Road Warrior: Mixed Renegade and Bandit Armor Set, Renegade 1 Handed Blade, Renegade 2 Handed Axe, 5 tier 1 Molotovs, 2 Basic Bandages, Rage and Damage potions

pathways.name: DoomsDay Prepper
pathways.description: The DoomsDay Prepper: This version is for those of you who want to get to the good stuff already, 6 starting weapons including a Rifle, Pistol, Bow, and Crossbow
